event_1_bring: Indoor shoes, a water bottle, and a smile
event_1_shortDescription: 🔥 Bootcamp & Party with Jorge & Azahara from Spain!
event_1_description: Mark your calendars – November 8–9 – a brand new bootcamp is coming your way!
This time, we’re bringing in two incredible dancers straight from Spain – Jorge & Azahara! 🇪🇸✨
They will help take your dancing to the next level, so don’t miss this chance to grow, connect, and be inspired!
💃 Party: Yes! There will be a party on November 8 – included for all bootcamp participants!
Spots are limited – secure your place now!
event_2_shortDescription: Switch roles and elevate your bachata – learn both leading and following!
event_2_description: Discover how much more fun bachata becomes when you learn both leading and following!
In this high-energy workshop, Nora & Sisco guide you step by step through techniques that make role rotation smooth, musical, and playful.
🎟 Level: Open – basic bachata steps are all you need
👟 Bring: Indoor shoes, a water bottle, and an open mind
Spaces are limited—book your spot today!
Dance more equally, dance more creatively—see you on the floor!
event_3_shortDescription: We're going together! A fantastic trip with world-class workshops and socials.
